sketch.compiler.ast.core.stmts

Class StmtFor

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketch.compiler.ast.core.FENode
      • sketch.compiler.ast.core.stmts.Statement
        • sketch.compiler.ast.core.stmts.StmtFor

  • public class StmtFor
extends Statement
    A C-style for loop. The loop contains an initialization statement, a loop condition, and an increment statement. On entry, the initialization statement is executed, and then the condition is evaluated. If the condition is true, the body is executed, followed by the increment statement. This loops until the condition returns false. Continue statements cause control flow to go to the increment statement.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Maze <dmaze@cag.lcs.mit.edu>

      StmtFor(java.lang.String iterName, Expression upperBound, Statement body)
      Creates a canonical for loop of the form for(int iterName=0; iterName < upperBound; ++iterName){body}
